general.note: Leave a note for the White Horse Team
general.currency_at_checkout_html: {{ shop_name }} process all orders in {{ shop_currency }}. While the content of your cart is currently displayed in , you will check out using {{ shop_currency }} at the most current exchange rate.

onboarding.product_description: This area is used to describe your product’s details. Tell customers about the look, feel, and style of your product. Add details on color, materials used, sizing, and where it was made.
onboarding.blog_excerpt: Your store hasn’t published any blog posts yet. A blog can be used to talk about new product launches, tips, or other news you want to share with your customers. You can check out Shopify’s ecommerce blog for inspiration and advice for your own store and blog.
onboarding.no_content: This section doesn’t currently include any content. Add content to this section using the sidebar.
onboarding.instagram_invalid_token: The Instagram access token is invalid. Check to make sure you added the complete token.
onboarding.instagram_ratelimit_token: Your store is currently over Instagram's rate limit. Contact Style Hatch support for details.

map.address_query_limit_html: You have exceeded the Google API usage limit. Consider upgrading to a Premium Plan.
map.auth_error_html: There was a problem authenticating your Google Maps account.

shipping.shipping_method_title: Ships from Texas - Choose Method Below
shipping.title: Method
shipping.no_rates_for_country_notice: Shipping methods are not available for your region due to certain items or shipping/billing address errors. Note: Shipping and billing addresses for orders going to California and Idaho must be identical.

shipping_method_not_available_generic.other: Due to the PACT Act, we are unable to ship products containing e-liquid to your area.
shipping_method_not_available_generic.one: We cannot sell vapes to your area at this current time. Here is a list of states that we can or have decided to only ship to at this current time: Alabama, Alaska, Arizona, Colorado, Connecticut, Delaware, Florida, Idaho, Illinois, Indiana, Iowa, Kansas, Kentucky, Michigan, Mississippi, Missouri, Montana, Nebraska, Nevada, New Mexico, North Carolina, North Dakota, Ohio, Oklahoma, Pennsylvania, South Carolina, Tennessee, Texas, Virginia, Washington, West Virginia, Wisconsin, Wyoming.

shipping_errors.shipping_method_not_available: Payment methods are not available for your region due to certain items or shipping/billing address errors. Note: Shipping and billing addresses for orders going to California and Idaho must be identical.

errors.please_select_card_value: Please select a gift card value

landing.in_store: Shopping in store? Scan this code!
landing.online: Shopping online? Use this code at checkout:
landing.heading: {senders_name} sent you a gift card!
landing.instruction1: Save or print the code on this page for later.
landing.instruction2: Start shopping at {shop.name}, by going to {shop.domain}.
landing.instruction3: Find the item(s) you would like to purchase, and go to checkout.
landing.instruction4: Enter in the code from above in the gift card box to redeem your gift card.
landing.balance_page: Check your balance any time at:
landing.video_heading: ... and they left you a video message!
landing.download_video: If you're having trouble viewing the video, download it here
landing.download_switch_browser: If you're having trouble viewing the video, either change browsers or download it here

purchase.custom_values_notice: Custom values are only available in {currency}
purchase.preview_info: Below is a preview of the page your gift recipient will be sent.
purchase.gift_card_issued_after_checkout: Once checkout is completed, you will receive a confirmation email. The purchased gift card will be sent to the recipient on the selected delivery date and time, which will contain the gift card code, your message, and instructions on how to redeem it.
purchase.checkout_redirect: Please wait while we redirect you to checkout
purchase.desc_gift_card: Select gift card amount and delivery details
purchase.video_recorder_error_message: Enable access to your webcam and microphone by clicking the lock symbol and enabling your Camera and Microphone permissions. If your permissions are not visible, refresh the page and try sending a video message again.
purchase.video_recorder_thumbnail_message: Choose your video thumbnail from the images above or
purchase.video_recorder_tainted_thumbnail_message: To select a thumbnail image you must

sms.body: Your {{shop.currency}}{{giftcard.amount}} gift card for vapewh.com is active. Use the link below to redeem your gift card.

email.subject: {{giftcard.message_from}} sent you a gift card
email.body_text: Your {{shop.currency}}{{giftcard.amount}} gift card for VapeWH.com is active. Keep this email or write down your gift card number.
email.footer_text: Please feel free to contact us at {{shop.email}} if you have any questions or face any problems.
email.purchaser_subject: Your gift card to {{giftcard.recipient_name}} has been delivered!
email.purchaser_body_text: The {{shop.name}} gift card you purchased for {{giftcard.recipient_name}} has been delivered.
